text: Dorothy Anne Todd (24 January 1909 â€“ 6 May 1993) was an English producer and actress. In the movie Perfect Strangers, she played a nurse. She played Kay in Ships with Wings. Todd was born in Hartford, Cheshire, England. She died of a stroke in London at age eighty four. ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Cheshire Category:Deaths from stroke Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:1909 births Category:1993 deaths
title: Ann Todd
